name: Virtual reality
description:
We pointed out why living with the disorder should be your first focus. The purpose of our project is to raise awareness.  We are exposing the concept of "The Octopi Wall Street" during this Virtual Reality simulation in which the human polluter is damned because of the petrol he's living with.  The VR game has been made in a week during a training course at "Interface3" in Brussels by 3 students (cf credits/owners).  This project is an adaptation based on Donna Haraway's book: "Staying with the Trouble, Making Kin in the Chthulucene".

Contributors:   Siisi4  /  phamthuyngan /  Katanaïs

Handmade with love ❤

HDRI/ SOUND
